title: Hecarim uses Devastating Charge, tries to run at Ryze
body:
Gets snared by Ryze, then ulted by Varus. Dies while trying to ult away. "LUL Varus and Ryze got through pick ban"

Tries the same thing again later.

And a third time.

Because apparently Hecarim has forgotten his ult has a much longer range and would allow him to get to the Ryze BEFORE Ryze is in range for the snare.
